comments:
build N20031107

- open an plug-in manifest editor on a plugin.xml
- select the source tab
- nothing happens
- log shows NPE

	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:601)

PDESourcePage was extending AbstractTextEditor and trying to unregister the 
BOOKMARK action.  This action is currently created by ExtendedTextEditor.  So 
PDE was trying to unregister an action that had not been created.

Fixed by having PDESourcePage extend ExtendedTextEditor.
